channel.title: Critical System, u like it?
channel.description:
IF U READ U REPLY. (i just wanna know what u think about it)
magic is overpowered isnt it ? poor warriors getting pwnd by mages and rangers but this has ended in my server!
i added a critical hit system wich will hit randomly (well not fully random ;) )
based on the attack - it will hit more criticals based on the strenght - it will hit more damage
u will always hit more then you could hit normally it is calculed on a special way wich will never fail
or it hits your max or higher,for example
when a lvl 5 fights a lvl 20
-the lvl 20 has 15 strenght
-the lvl 15 has 10att and 10str
the lvl 20 will hit more damage but,the lvl 15 will crit hit him more often making it so the lvl 15 will hit almost as high as the lvl 20 would
what you think ?
